Opisanie: 17-letnyaya blondinochka Sanni sovershaet morskoy kruiz vmeste so svoimi bogatymi roditelyami, kotorym pochemu-to vzbrelo v golovu otmetit&#039; godovshchinu svoey svad&#039;by... Yunoy krasotke ne ochen&#039;-to bylo po nravu puteshestvie v kompanii predkov, i zhelanie okazat&#039;sya gde-nibud&#039; podal&#039;she ot nikh stanovilos&#039; vsyo sil&#039;nee. Nedaleko ot Bermudskikh ostrovov ono sbylos&#039;: strashnaya burya naletelya na korabl&#039; i Sanni smylo za bort. Na sleduyushchee utro ona ochnulas&#039; na prekrasnom peschanom plyazhe na beregu zhivopisnogo i... neobitaemogo ostrova. Mobil&#039;nik isporchen, makiyazh razmylo, a do blizhayshego supermarketa okh kak daleko...

Perevod tol&#039;ko teksta, zastavki vse na nemetskom.
